summary: Wooden Bridge was a passage over the northern trench of old Tehran, connecting the capital to the countryside of Shemiran. A connection between old Tehran and modern Tehran.
cast: Bahram Radan|Mahnaz Afshar|Farhad Aslani|Mehran Modiri|Hediyeh Tehrani|Borzou Arjmand|Atila Pesiani|Omid Roohani
title: The Wooden Bridge
